mapper.select: SELECT o.oid, o.pid, o.mid, o.odate, o.ostatus, o.amount, o.postcode, o.address, o.extraAddress, o.detailAddress, o.oname, o.ophone, d.oDid, d.pcnt, p.pname, p.price FROM zava_order o INNER JOIN zava_order_detail d ON o.oid = d.oid INNER JOIN zava_product p ON d.pid = p.pid WHERE o.mid = #{mid} AND o.oid = #{oid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zava_order(oid, mid, ostatus, amount, postcode, address, extraAddress, detailAddress, oname, ophone) VALUES (#{oid}, #{mid}, #{ostatus}, #{amount}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{extraAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{oname}, #{ophone})
